channel.title: Travel on Tony Duan
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Tony Duan

item.title: 서울 | Seoul
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) #location=geocode( "Seoul" ) lon=127.00175 lat=37.53555 m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="Seoul") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[37.53555,127.00175,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Seoul",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[37.53555,127.00175],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[37.53555,37.53555],"lng":[127.00175,127.00175]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} K POP at the Airport Ginseng Chicken Soup A TWOSOME PLACE very nice coffee shop. Korean BBQ beef Shake Shack

item.title: 臺北 | Taipei
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) #location=geocode( "Taipei" ) lon=121.53363 lat=25.01801 m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="Taipei") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[25.01801,121.53363,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Taipei",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[25.01801,121.53363],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[25.01801,25.01801],"lng":[121.53363,121.53363]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Arrival On the License Plate, it say Taiwan province The Best beef noodle Nationalist Party of China

item.title: 東京 | Tokyo

item.title: 重庆 | ChongQing
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) #location=geocode( "ChongQing" ) lon=106.54793 lat=29.55513 m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="2017 ebay outing ChongQing") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[29.55513,106.54793,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"2017 ebay outing ChongQing",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[29.55513,106.54793],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[29.55513,29.55513],"lng":[106.54793,106.54793]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} My Second group photo in ebay family:

item.title: Hà Nội | Hanoi
item.description: Location: library(leaflet) library(ggmap) #location=geocode( "Hanoi" ) lon=105.80835 lat=21.02003 m <- leaflet()%>% addTiles() %>% # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles setView(lng=lon, lat=lat, zoom = 05) %>% addMarkers(lng=lon, lat=lat, popup="Hanoi") m {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[21.02003,105.80835,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Hanoi",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"setView":[[21.02003,105.80835],5,[]],"limits":{"lat":[21.02003,21.02003],"lng":[105.80835,105.80835]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} coffee Egg coffee @ The Giang Café and Coconut coffee @ Cong Caphe .Two are in my top 10 coffee list. Food Street food is health and crazy good.

item.title: 濟州島 | Jeju Island
